items.name: Sopes
items.description: 3 handmade corn tortillas topped w/ refried beans, potato, chorizo, lettuce, crema, feta, salsa

items.name: Flautas
items.description: 2 homemade corn tortillas (Beef / Chicken / Veggie) w/ special green sauce. Lunch hours only

items.name: Chorinachos
items.description: Layers of tortilla chips + chorizo, pico, cheese, crema

items.name: Five Layer Nacho Dip
items.description: Beans, guac, crema, pico, cheddar, mozzarella, guajillo sauce

items.name: Chorizo Queso Fundido
items.description: Chorizo in guajillo sauce, melted cheese, tortilla chips

items.name: Homemade Quesadilla
items.description: Corn tortilla w/ roasted poblano, mushrooms, corn, mozzarella, cheddar; side salsa verde. Choice of tortilla: Guajillo, Nopal, Beets, Cactus. Add Beef or Chicken +$3.00

items.name: Molletes
items.description: Open-faced sandwich (Beef or Chicken) w/ refried beans, cheddar, pico, salsa verde, crema

items.name: Sopa de Tortilla
items.description: Tomato & ancho chile soup, chicken, corn chips, cheddar, avocado, crema

items.name: Nopales (Cactus Salad)
items.description: Butter lettuce, pickled nopales, red onions, pico, radish, guajillo vinaigrette

items.name: Rio Alto Salad
items.description: Romaine, avocados, radishes, apples, red onions, lemon jalapeño creamy dressing

items.name: Huevos Rancheros
items.description: 2 fried eggs on corn tortilla, refried beans, cheddar, salsa verde, rice, crema

items.name: Chilaquiles Rio Style
items.description: Corn tortilla chips in salsa, topped with chicken, cheese, onion & crema. Choice of salsa verde or salsa roja

items.name: Amigas Enchiladas
items.description: Corn tortillas filled w/ Chicken Tinga, Beef Brisket, Pork or Veggie + salsa verde, salsa roja, mole, or guajillo sauce. Add side of rice & beans +$3.00

items.name: Carne Asada
items.description: 7oz Mexican style grilled steak + sautéed onions, nopales, 6oz chorizo; side rice, pico, 3 tortillas

items.name: Mole
items.description: Stuffed duck with cranberries. Traditional mole sauce (3 chiles, garlic, onions, seeds, cinnamon, chocolate, banana, plantain, spices). May contain nuts. Served w/ rice & beans

items.name: Chile Relleno
items.description: Stuffed poblano w/ smoked gouda, cooked in ancho chili tomato sauce. Served w/ rice & beans

items.name: Azteca Lasagna
items.description: Corn tortillas layered w/ beef tenderloin, spinach, caramelized onions, feta, smoked gouda, mascarpone, roasted corn, creamy poblano sauce. Served w/ side salad

items.name: Rio Alto Sombrero Platter
items.description: A taste of Mexican antojitos: 2 Empanadas, 2 Hard Tacos, 1 Sope, 2 Enchiladas, 2 Soft Tacos. Served w/ pico & guac

items.name: Three Farmers Torta
items.description: Bun, shredded chicken tinga, refried beans, butter lettuce, tomato, avocado, mayo

items.name: Ranchero Torta
items.description: Bun, slow-cooked marinated beef, refried beans, butter lettuce, tomato, avocado, chipotle mayo

items.name: Crazy Horse
items.description: Bun, refried beans, caramelized onions, roasted pineapple, lettuce, tomato, lime, chipotle mayo. Choice of pork or chorizo

items.name: Rio Alto Burritos
items.description: Lunch only — Whole wheat tortilla, refried beans, rice, chipotle mayo, lettuce, cheddar cheese. Choice of Chicken Tinga, Shredded Beef, Pork or Veggie. Served with tortilla chips, crema fresca & pico
